languages.text: "Да много чего было, шерин, всего и не припомнишь". {n}Солдафонский тон вдруг сменяется знакомый медовым голосом.{/n} "Про Простор я тебе всю правду, как есть, рассказала. Про {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} и Владайма... Про то, как дела у нас ведутся. Не пойми неправильно, свет моих уставших очей, я в этой жизни не люблю две вещи: на прошлое оборачиваться, и когда в душу без спросу лезут".

traits.locale_text: "Да много чего было, шерин, всего и не припомнишь". {n}Солдафонский тон вдруг сменяется знакомый медовым голосом.{/n} "Про Простор я тебе всю правду, как есть, рассказала. Про {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} и Владайма... Про то, как дела у нас ведутся. Не пойми неправильно, свет моих уставших очей, я в этой жизни не люблю две вещи: на прошлое оборачиваться, и когда в душу без спросу лезут".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Oh so many things, shereen, I'm struggling to keep track of them all." {n}The barking voice of the military grunt is gone and Jae is once again talking in her familiar honeyed voice.{/n} "I told you the truth about the Expanse, and not a single word of it was a lie. What I told you about {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} and Vladaym, and how we do business in these parts — all true. Don't get me wrong, the apple of my weary eye, there are two things in this life that I dislike: looking back at the past and having someone pry into my soul without asking."
languages.original_text: "Да много чего было, шерин, всего и не припомнишь". {n}Солдафонский тон вдруг сменяется знакомый медовым голосом.{/n} "Про Простор я тебе всю правду, как есть, рассказала. Про {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} и Владайма... Про то, как дела у нас ведутся. Не пойми неправильно, свет моих уставших очей, я в этой жизни не люблю две вещи: на прошлое оборачиваться, и когда в душу без спросу лезут".

traits.locale_text: "There were so many things, shereen, it is getting hard to remember them all." {n}The barking voice of the military grunt is gone, Jae is again talking in the familiar honeyed voice.{/n} "I told you the truth about the Expanse, and not a single word of it was a lie. About {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} and Vladaym... And about how we are do business in these parts. Don't get me wrong, the apple of my tired eye, but there are two things in this life that I dislike: having to look into the past and having someone pry into my soul without asking permission first."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There were so many things, shereen, it is getting hard to remember them all." {n}The barking voice of the military grunt is gone, Jae is again talking in the familiar honeyed voice.{/n} "I told you the truth about the Expanse, and not a single word of it was a lie. About {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} and Vladaym... And about how we are do business in these parts. Don't get me wrong, the apple of my tired eye, but there are two things in this life that I dislike: having to look into the past and having someone pry into my soul without asking permission first."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

What I told you about {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} and Vladaym, and how we do business in these parts — all true. Don't get me wrong, the apple of my weary eye, there are two things in this life that I dislike: looking back at the past and having someone pry into my soul without asking."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh so many things, shereen, I'm struggling to keep track of them all." {n}The barking voice of the military grunt is gone and Jae is once again talking in her familiar honeyed voice.{/n} "I told you the truth about the Expanse, and not a single word of it was a lie. What I told you about {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} and Vladaym, and how we do business in these parts — all true. Don't get me wrong, the apple of my weary eye, there are two things in this life that I dislike: looking back at the past and having someone pry into my soul without asking."

traits.locale_text: "Oh so many things, shereen, I'm struggling to keep track of them all." {n}The barking voice of the military grunt is gone and Jae is once again talking in her familiar honeyed voice.{/n} "I told you the truth about the Expanse, and not a single word of it was a lie. What I told you about {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} and Vladaym, and how we do business in these parts — all true. Don't get me wrong, the apple of my weary eye, there are two things in this life that I dislike: looking back at the past and having someone pry into my soul without asking."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “噢，我说过那么多实话，亲爱的。我甚至都没办法把它们全都记录下来。”{n}充满军人腔调的嘟囔声消失了，婕伊再次用你早已熟悉的甜言蜜语开了口。{/n}“我告诉了你科罗努斯扩区的真相，没有一个字是谎言。我还告诉过你{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}与弗拉迪姆的事情，以及我们在这里是怎么做生意的，那些话全都是真的。别误会了我的意思，我挚爱的珍宝。我这辈子有两件事情很不喜欢：一是回顾过去，二是有人不打招呼就随意窥探我的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "Oh so many things, shereen, I'm struggling to keep track of them all." {n}The barking voice of the military grunt is gone and Jae is once again talking in her familiar honeyed voice.{/n} "I told you the truth about the Expanse, and not a single word of it was a lie. What I told you about {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} and Vladaym, and how we do business in these parts — all true. Don't get me wrong, the apple of my weary eye, there are two things in this life that I dislike: looking back at the past and having someone pry into my soul without asking."

traits.locale_text: “噢，我说过那么多实话，亲爱的。我甚至都没办法把它们全都记录下来。”{n}充满军人腔调的嘟囔声消失了，婕伊再次用你早已熟悉的甜言蜜语开了口。{/n}“我告诉了你科罗努斯扩区的真相，没有一个字是谎言。我还告诉过你{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}与弗拉迪姆的事情，以及我们在这里是怎么做生意的，那些话全都是真的。别误会了我的意思，我挚爱的珍宝。我这辈子有两件事情很不喜欢：一是回顾过去，二是有人不打招呼就随意窥探我的灵魂。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Oh so many things, shereen, I'm struggling to keep track of them all." {n}The barking voice of the military grunt is gone and Jae is once again talking in her familiar honeyed voice.{/n} "I told you the truth about the Expanse, and not a single word of it was a lie. What I told you about Footfall and Vladaym, and how we do business in these parts — all true. Don't get me wrong, the apple of my weary eye, there are two things in this life that I dislike: looking back at the past and having someone pry into my soul without asking."

languages.text: «Oh, tantas cosas, shereen, que me cuesta llevar la cuenta de todas». {n}El ladrido de la voz militar ha desaparecido. Jae vuelve a hablar en su tono meloso característico.{/n} «Le conté la verdad sobre la Extensión, y ni una sola palabra sobre ello era mentira. Lo que le conté acerca de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g} y Vladaym, y cómo funcionan los negocios por aquí, igual: todo cierto. No me malinterprete, luz de mis cansados ojos, hay dos cosas en esta vida que no soporto: mirar al pasado y que alguien intente escudriñar mi alma sin pedir permiso».
languages.original_text: "Oh so many things, shereen, I'm struggling to keep track of them all." {n}The barking voice of the military grunt is gone and Jae is once again talking in her familiar honeyed voice.{/n} "I told you the truth about the Expanse, and not a single word of it was a lie. What I told you about {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} and Vladaym, and how we do business in these parts — all true. Don't get me wrong, the apple of my weary eye, there are two things in this life that I dislike: looking back at the past and having someone pry into my soul without asking."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, tantas cosas, shereen, que me cuesta llevar la cuenta de todas». {n}El ladrido de la voz militar ha desaparecido. Jae vuelve a hablar en su tono meloso característico.{/n} «Le conté la verdad sobre la Extensión, y ni una sola palabra sobre ello era mentira. Lo que le conté acerca de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g} y Vladaym, y cómo funcionan los negocios por aquí, igual: todo cierto. No me malinterprete, luz de mis cansados ojos, hay dos cosas en esta vida que no soporto: mirar al pasado y que alguien intente escudriñar mi alma sin pedir permiso».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ええ、いろいろありすぎて、全部を把握するのに苦戦してるところなのよ、シャリーン」{n}軍人の吠えるような声は消え、ジェイは再び聞き慣れた甘い声で話す。{/n}「エクスパンスについてあたしは真実を話したわ。嘘は１つもない。{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}やヴラダイムについて話したことも、この地域でのビジネスのやり方も、全部本当のことよ。誤解しないでほしいのよ、愛しい人。あたしには人生で嫌いなことが2つあるんの。それは、過去を振り返ることと、誰かが勝手にあたしの魂を詮索することよ」
languages.original_text: "Oh so many things, shereen, I'm struggling to keep track of them all." {n}The barking voice of the military grunt is gone and Jae is once again talking in her familiar honeyed voice.{/n} "I told you the truth about the Expanse, and not a single word of it was a lie. What I told you about {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} and Vladaym, and how we do business in these parts — all true. Don't get me wrong, the apple of my weary eye, there are two things in this life that I dislike: looking back at the past and having someone pry into my soul without asking."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、いろいろありすぎて、全部を把握するのに苦戦してるところなのよ、シャリーン」{n}軍人の吠えるような声は消え、ジェイは再び聞き慣れた甘い声で話す。{/n}「エクスパンスについてあたしは真実を話したわ。嘘は１つもない。{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}やヴラダイムについて話したことも、この地域でのビジネスのやり方も、全部本当のことよ。誤解しないでほしいのよ、愛しい人。あたしには人生で嫌いなことが2つあるんの。それは、過去を振り返ることと、誰かが勝手にあたしの魂を詮索することよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, so vieles, Shereen, ich kann kaum den Überblick behalten." {n}Der bellende Ton der Soldatin ist verschwunden, Jae spricht wieder in ihrer üblichen honigsüßen Stimme.{/n} "Ich habe Euch die Wahrheit über die Ausdehnung gesagt, kein einziges Wort war gelogen. Was ich Euch über {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} und Vladaym gesagt habe und darüber, wie wir hier Geschäfte machen ... alles wahr. Versteht mich nicht falsch, Licht meiner müden Augen, es gibt zwei Dinge im Leben, die ich nicht mag: Auf die Vergangenheit zurückblicken und wenn jemand ungefragt in meiner Seele herumbohrt."
languages.original_text: "Oh so many things, shereen, I'm struggling to keep track of them all." {n}The barking voice of the military grunt is gone and Jae is once again talking in her familiar honeyed voice.{/n} "I told you the truth about the Expanse, and not a single word of it was a lie. What I told you about {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} and Vladaym, and how we do business in these parts — all true. Don't get me wrong, the apple of my weary eye, there are two things in this life that I dislike: looking back at the past and having someone pry into my soul without asking."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, so vieles, Shereen, ich kann kaum den Überblick behalten." {n}Der bellende Ton der Soldatin ist verschwunden, Jae spricht wieder in ihrer üblichen honigsüßen Stimme.{/n} "Ich habe Euch die Wahrheit über die Ausdehnung gesagt, kein einziges Wort war gelogen. Was ich Euch über {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} und Vladaym gesagt habe und darüber, wie wir hier Geschäfte machen ... alles wahr. Versteht mich nicht falsch, Licht meiner müden Augen, es gibt zwei Dinge im Leben, die ich nicht mag: Auf die Vergangenheit zurückblicken und wenn jemand ungefragt in meiner Seele herumbohrt."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Mais bien sûr, shereen, tant de choses que j'ai le plus grand mal à me souvenir de tout. » {n}La voix bourrue du soldat a disparu, remplacée par le ton mielleux dont vous avez l'habitude.{/n} « Je vous ai dit la vérité au sujet des Étendues de Koronus, rien que la vérité. Il en va de même pour ce que je vous ai raconté sur {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, Vladaym et la façon dont nous menons nos affaires ici. Ne vous méprenez pas, ma prunelle, il y a deux chose que je déteste dans la vie : ressasser le passé et que l'on sonde mon âme sans demander la permission. »
languages.original_text: "Oh so many things, shereen, I'm struggling to keep track of them all." {n}The barking voice of the military grunt is gone and Jae is once again talking in her familiar honeyed voice.{/n} "I told you the truth about the Expanse, and not a single word of it was a lie. What I told you about {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} and Vladaym, and how we do business in these parts — all true. Don't get me wrong, the apple of my weary eye, there are two things in this life that I dislike: looking back at the past and having someone pry into my soul without asking."

traits.locale_text: « Mais bien sûr, shereen, tant de choses que j'ai le plus grand mal à me souvenir de tout. » {n}La voix bourrue du soldat a disparu, remplacée par le ton mielleux dont vous avez l'habitude.{/n} « Je vous ai dit la vérité au sujet des Étendues de Koronus, rien que la vérité. Il en va de même pour ce que je vous ai raconté sur {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, Vladaym et la façon dont nous menons nos affaires ici. Ne vous méprenez pas, ma prunelle, il y a deux chose que je déteste dans la vie : ressasser le passé et que l'on sonde mon âme sans demander la permission. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "O kadar çok konuda söylemedim ki hesabını tutmakta zorlanıyorum." {n}Sesindeki asker kalınlığı yok olan Jae, bir kez daha o tanıdık tatlı sesiyle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sana Enginlik hakkında söylediklerim doğruydu, tek bir yalan söz bile konuşmadım. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} ve Vladaym hakkında ve buralarda ne tip işlere bulaştığımız konusunda anlattıklarımın da doğruydu. Şu yorgun gözümün bebeği, beni sakın yanlış anlama. Şu hayatta hoşlanmadığım iki şey vardır: Geçmişe bakmak ve birilerinin izin almadan ruhumun derinliklerine burnunu sokması."
languages.original_text: "Oh so many things, shereen, I'm struggling to keep track of them all." {n}The barking voice of the military grunt is gone and Jae is once again talking in her familiar honeyed voice.{/n} "I told you the truth about the Expanse, and not a single word of it was a lie. What I told you about {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} and Vladaym, and how we do business in these parts — all true. Don't get me wrong, the apple of my weary eye, there are two things in this life that I dislike: looking back at the past and having someone pry into my soul without asking."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, neler neler şirinim, hesabını tutmakta zorlanıyorum." {n}Sert bir askerden çıkan kalın ses yok oluyor ve Jae bir kez daha o tanıdık tatlı sesiyle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sana Enginlik hakkında gerçeği söyledim ve tek bir yalan söz bile konuşmadım. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} ve Vladaym hakkında ve buralarda ne tip işlere bulaştığımız konusunda anlattıklarımın hepsi doğruydu. Şu yorgun gözümün bebeği, beni sakın yanlış anlama, şu hayatta hoşlanmadığım iki şey vardır: Geçmişe bakmak ve birilerinin izin almadan ruhumun derinliklerine burnunu sokması."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
